contents:
Statement on the Police Brutality in Chinese University of Hong Kong and Hong Kong Polytechnic University:

"The University of St Andrew's Students Association totally and unreservedly condemns the attack on democracy, free speech, and students that took place in Hong Kong last week. Closer to home, and no less importantly, it condemns the bullying and targeted harassment of Hong Kong students who have spoken out about the protests. Any instances of bullying should be reported to the University discipline officer (discipline@)"

We would like to encourage all students to sign the petition below:

https://www.change.org/p/university-of-st-andrews-stand-wit…


這個聲明是11月20日發的。聲明很簡短，主要有以下兩點：
1. 譴責香港警察濫用暴力和對民主運動的打壓；
2. 對於本校的香港學生被騷擾與攻擊（很有可能是小粉紅），予以同樣譴責。

最後是一份Stand with Hong Kong的請願書，特別强調要求對警察開展獨立調查。
200個簽名已經收集了123個，請大家也幫忙簽一下。
Update：138個簽名了，大家再幫幫忙
